text: From 1994 to 2004, fans tuned in to Friends to keep up with the daily dealings and romantic relationships of six close friends trying to make it in New York. Rachel Green ’ s ( Jennifer Aniston ) character ’ s disastrous dating life was particularly popular with viewers. While they could likely name several of Rachel ’ s former beaus, many are just now learning that Jennifer dated three of her Friends co - stars in real life. She wasn ’ t romantic with David Schwimmer, who played her boyfriend Ross Gellar on the show. She also avoided getting involved with Matthew Perry, who played Chandler Bing, and Matt LeBlanc, who played Joey Tribbiani on the NBC sitcom.
